ingredients.content: ½ tsp Korean chilli flakes (gochugaru) (see tip)
2 aubergines (approx. 700 g), cut in wedges (2 cm x 15 cm) (see tip)

preparations.content: Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add soy sauce, oil, sesame seeds, sugar and chilli flakes then mix <b>5 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position, weigh in aubergines then distribute between Varoma dish and Varoma tray. Season with salt and pepper, insert Varoma tray, cover Varoma then steam <b>18-20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> until soft and cooked.
Transfer aubergine to a serving dish, pour over reserved sauce and garnish with spring onions. Serve warm.
